title: Stock Futures Waver Ahead of Fed Minutes
sub_head: The yield on 10-year U.S. Treasurys extended its recent series of declines
body:
U.S. stock futures meandered between small gains and losses ahead of the release of minutes from the Federal Reserveâ€™s most recent policy meeting, which will be combed for details on the path of coming interest-rate rises.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 shed 0.2% after the broad-market index closed down 0.8% on Tuesday. Nasdaq-100 futures edged down 0.1%, suggesting that technology stocks could record muted losses after a sharp selloff the day before.
